## Problem Statement

What problem does this RFC address? Why does it need to be at the protocol layer?

## Proposed Solution

High-level description of your proposed approach.

## Open Questions

What is unresolved? What does the community need to weigh in on?

## Related RFCs

List any existing RFCs this relates to or modifies.

## Next Steps

Are you proposing to write a full RFC draft? Or looking for discussion first?
